page.title: 15CHANGES IN STEWARTBY
page.content: landscape of Bedfordshire for over fifty years, remaining a major source of employment and the focal point of Stewartby. 1.{Housing}:This has been the major issue which has concerned the village. It was already the policy of the company before the takeover to sell its houses, but would the takeover enhance this process? We conducted a survey which included a questionaire, sent to the residents of Stewartby. This found that 69% of those who answered intended to buy their houses at the price set. The company has sold all its houses either to tenants, or to an individual investing property company. 2.{What were residents reactions to {the companys policies?} Elderly residents who did not have the resources to purchase their houses
